Html: I am wondering due to the lack of answers to posted discussions if this project is still under development of have we seen the end of it? I am wondering also of the status of the ability to upgrade from version 2 to version 3, will this be possible at all in the near future? If these questions are not answered in a timely manner I would assume that the project is not currently being developed any further. Thank you.

I'm kind of in the same place as you. I am not sure if I should use this kit to create our club site or should I use the base MS kit. I do like some of the features that this kit offers but I also have to weigh the options against time to go live. Hopefully we will get a response so we can make an informed decsision.
